question: 取材
sourceMnemonic: Your job is to <kanji>take</kanji> <kanji>material</kanji>s from a bunch of different people because you're <vocabulary>covering an event</vocabulary>. This <vocabulary>data collection</vocabulary> needs to be thorough, so you try to take all the materials you can from as many people as you can find.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.

confusedWith: マスコミの取材が一斉に始まりました。
